features: [Professional Design] - The 360 degree cleaning mop head of the floor spray mop easily reach into the dark corners of sofas, bottoms, etc, do not need to bend over, bid farewell to mobile furniture. The aluminum alloy pole construction of the dust mop spray is sturdy, reliable, lightweight, flexible and durable

[Necessary Cleaning Assistant] - The microfiber spray mop pads have millions of microscopic fibers, which can grab dirt, dust, and hair, meanwhile reach deep into cracks to pick up more grime than flat disposables. The microfiber floor mop pad is 100% machine washable and reusable

[Wall Mounted] - The top of microfiber dust mop handle has metal ring, so you could hang the wet mop on the wall. You don't need to make more room for the floor mop anymore. These spray mop with washable pads can clean your kitchen, hardwood, marble, tile, laminate, or ceramic floors quick, easy, and safe

[Refillable 435ML Bottle] - The refillable spray mop is always ready for cleaning, with reusable cleaning system that doesn’t require batteries o charging cable. The wet jet spray mop includes a reusable 435ml bottle, using more flexible with light weight body. Please clean the bottle when you finished cleaning

[Extra Scraper With Comb] - The multifunctional scraper is given to squeeze water on the pad of reusable spray mops, and remove dirt and stains on floor/tile. The side of the comb shape can remove hair, which makes the cleaning job much easier. From now on, using our spray floor mop will save your time, money and effort in cleaning work

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360° Rotating Spray Mop for Hardwood Floors Flexible 360 degree cleaning mop head allows you easily clean around corners and all hard-to-reach edges. The 360° swivel head of wet dry mops can get around those bulky, heavy furniture without the headache of moving them all around. All-in-One Solution for House Cleaning Simply press the handle trigger, spray mops turn water to water mist evenly, and you are ready to clean Specification Name: Microfiber Spray Mop/Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning Color: Gray & Red Material: Aluminum Package Includes:1*Refillable Mop +3*Microfiber Mop Pads+1*Scraper+ 1*Refillable Bottle ✓ Mop with Sprayer for Floor Cleaning. Features to used as both dry mop and wet mop ✓ Wet Jet Mop. Fill the bottle up with the detergent according to your need ✓ Practical Scraper. A great helper of the easy mop in the house cleaning ✓ Swivel Mop Head. Mop spray can reach out every corner to clean every dirt in your house

Spray Mops for Floor Cleaning with Washable pads --- Less effort in housework ---Velcro Design. Floor mops with sprayer come with 3 washable mop replacement cleaning pads which can be tear out and stick-up repeatedly. You can quickly switch to replace your wet or dry mop, making cleaning simple and efficient. ---The 435ML refillable bottle. You could fill it up with the detergent according to your need, such as commercial detergent or plain water. Just simple squeeze the trigger on the top handle, you could start cleaning by spraying mist. No need heavy mop and bucket anymore. Note: Since each spray mops for floor cleaning will undergo a nozzle test before delivery, if you find that there is water left in the bottle after receiving the goods, this is a normal phenomenon, please rest assured to use the spray mop, thank you for your understanding

Practical Scraper Attached to the Wood Floor Mop The spray floor mop come with a scraper. The serrated edge can be used to scrape hair and debris off from microfibre cloth. what's more, the horizontal edge can also squeeze excess water built up on cloth after mopping, moreover, the brush and spatula can scrape tough dirt and stains on floor. Spray Mop with Washable Pads-Core of the mop The selected 3 microfiber mop pads can catch minimal dust and debris. What's more, raised edge fibre design can clean the gaps on the wall more thoroughly and protect vulnerable furniture. The microfiber mop pad is washable, and you could wash the dirty pad by hands or washing machine. Wet Mops for Floor Cleaning-Easy to Operate Thanks to one-hand operate trigger, you do not need to bend over and heavy bucket, just simply press the trigger, and you can start mopping. Moreover, Our anti-slip foam handle make you less effort during cleaning, gives you a comfortable grip experience.

Wall Mounted Hardwood Floor Mop for Kitchen Bathroom Cleaning Our wet jet mop can make your hardwood floor, laminate floor, tile floor, stone and concrete floor cleaning work easily completed. Also the top of wet spray mops handle has wall mounted design, so you could hang the microfiber spray mop on the wall when you not using it. You do not need to worry about where should you put it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wide spray, easy to use. Pads clean well. Con: bottle hold water/cleaner is tiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use and does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want to buy another swifter so I tried this one with the microfiber pads instead. It worked really well on my wood floors with Fabuloso! Love that I can toss the pads in the wash too and reduce waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love it,easy to use ,does a good job on my floors and leave a wonderful smell in my house. I'm 80 and how light it is. The only think negative I could Sar the bottle is very flimsy I don't know if it can be replace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good little mop!
reviews.reviewText: Since my arthritic hands are getting more painful, I could not longer mop our mostly tile house with a mop and bucket. I tried the Rubbermaid mop first which was good, but the trigger was hard to pull and after two months, it stopped spraying. I bought another one, and again after two months, it stopped spraying. I then tried another brand, and the trigger was so stiff, it really hurt my hands to do my whole house. Then after asking the question about the trigger being hard to pull on this one and getting answers it was easy, I purchased this one. It was easy to assemble--took me all of a few minutes by myself. The trigger is thankfully, very easy to spray. The spray is wide making it a quick job. The mop is very lightweight. The only downside for me is that the refill bottle does not have a flat bottom. This makes it impossible to remove from the mop when you are finished and store it separately. I don't like to store the bottle of solution left in the mop, but there is no other way to take it out and store it separately. The pads that came with it seem better suited to just dusting. For mopping, I use the same size microfiber pads from my other mops. This mop was half the cost of the rubbermaid reveal, so if it lasts longer than two months, it will be awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have 4 of these, different brands two of them screwed up and they aren’t very old. One leaks and the other won’t spray. Fingers crossed this one hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dog lover’s dream!
reviews.reviewText: It didn’t take us long to get it out of the box once it arrived. We were pretty excited. All the complaints I read had me fearing the worst but I thought to myself, yes it’s only 20.00 and that can sometimes mean bad news but let’s be honest here… have you priced out the wet pads for flooring? If this broke and if I had to replace this in 3 months, I would STILL save money than having to buy the pads! The tracks the dogs bring in from outside is overwhelming and we needed something more cost effective. (Let alone using the microfiber dry helped move all the Golden hair from hard to reach places so it could be swept up and discarded first)We made a mixture that lasted through the dining room and the kitchen that might have cost .20 cents.I am EXTREMELY impressed with the washable pads and it comes with 3! Don’t look any further! WE LOVE IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s cheaply made but it works ok. Like the three heads it comes with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money

reviews.reviewText: As a single person with a large number of in-house furry babies - including two puppies who love to romp out in the snow and mud - this is SIMPLY THE BEST MOP I have ever owned ! So easy to use, so efficient and easy to clean.Cannot recommend highly enough !Thank you "Domi Patrol" and Thank you Amazon !Lisa Benedix, Bass River, NB Canada
Fabuloso! El bastón muy fuerte, aguanta peso al trapear y la microfibra excelente, no deja rayado el piso, limpia super bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use and nice size cleaning fluid bottle

reviews.reviewTitle: After one month the trigger broke and now I cannot use
reviews.reviewText: I was loving my mop until the trigger broke! I have only had it for one month! I did expect to to last longer than that. Not happy at all.

I have a lot of wood floor to clean and a golden retriever. I was looking for a mop that would make my life easier but wasn’t ready to go with a robot (yet), and couldn’t spend a fortune. Enter this mop. It’s soooooo easy to use I nearly cried the first time I used it - seriously. I used to have a Vileda mop and while it worked fine, it was such a chore to do the floors - yeah yeah, I know, cleaning the house is literally called “chores” - but this new mop made it so easy. It cleans them well, I can use whatever cleaning solution I want, and there’s no electrical cord to trip over. First world problems I know - and I ain’t complaining about having those problems, but seriously buy this mop. It seems sturdy enough and hopefully that lasts - but for the price and ease of use, you can’t go wrong with this choice.
